comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: The Norwich Union building (AKA Norwich Chambers) was at the corner of Hunter & Bligh Sts...per this SMH item the basement layers were being excavated in August 1885 - nla.gov.au/nla.news-article13595372 ...building work appears to have been completed by mid-late 1886...various digitised newspaper hits indicate tenants had moved in by September 1886. The Norwich Union building also features in this pic - www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2363484098/
